title: kaN vaLarAi
sahitya:
kaN vaLarAi shrI rAma kamalakkaN vaLarAi


anupallavi



caraNam 1    kamala vaiDUrya gOmEtakam nirai kAnti mighu marakata muttizhaitta
 kanaka manjamIdu janaka sutai un kamala malariNai varuDiDa shaTrE
    caraNam 2    vAlaik-kumarigaL nIlAmbari pADi shIlanE un pugazh mAlai toDuttiDa
 mallikai mullai maNam kamazh malarinAl alankaritta hamsadULi manjamIdu
    caraNam 3    pon mAn pinnODik-kaNaiyAladai mAittu shen tAL malar nOghak-kAnengum alaindu
 annai tanait-tEDi alaikaDal kaDandu kannenja dashamukhanai venra kaLai tIrak-
